title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: The Prestige
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and Blake Wilson discuss The Prestige, directed by Christopher Nolan and starring Christian Bale and Hugh Jackman. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
        

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
